gurmukhi: ਅਾਪਨੋ ਸੁਅੰਨੁ ਸਭ ਕਾਹੂਅੈ ਸੁੰਦਰ ਲਾਗੈ ਸਫਲੁ ਸੁੰਦਰਤਾ ਸੰਸਾਰ ਮੈ ਸਰਾਹੀਅੈ
transliteration: Aapano Suannu Sabh Kaahooai Soundar Laagai , Sadhalu Soundarataa Sansaar Mai Saraaheeai ?
translation: To everyone, his/her son looks beautiful. But one whom others praise is certainly beautiful.

gurmukhi: ਅਾਪਨੋ ਬਨਜੁ ਬੁਰੋ ਲਾਗਤ ਨ ਕਾਹੂ ਰਿਦੈ ਜਾੲਿ ਜਗੁ ਭਲੋ ਕਹੈ ਸੋੲੀ ਤੳੁ ਬਿਸਾਹੀਅੈ
transliteration: Aapano Banaju Buro Laagat N Kaahoo Ridai , Jaai Jagu Bhalo Kahai Soee Tau Bisaaheeai ?
translation: No one dislikes his profession, but one should trade only those commodities which are praised by others.

gurmukhi: ਅਾਪਨੇ ਕਰਮੁ ਕੁਲਾ ਧਰਮ ਕਰਤ ਸਭੈ ੳੁਤਮੁ ਕਰਮੁ ਲੋਗ ਬੇਦ ਅਵਗਾਹੀਅੈ
transliteration: Aapanay Karamu Kulaa Dharam Karat Sabhai , Outamu Karamu Log Bayd Avagaaheeai ?
translation: Everyone follows rites and traditions of one's family, but all deeds which are as per scriptures and according to social traditions are considered supreme.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰ ਬਿਨੁ ਮੁਕਤਿ ਨ ਹੋੲਿ ਸਬ ਕੋੳੂ ਕਹੈ ਮਾੲਿਅਾ ਮੈ ੳੁਦਾਸੁ ਰਾਖੈ ਸੋੲੀ ਗੁਰ ਚਾਹੀਅੈ ॥੫੫੩॥
transliteration: Gur Binu Moukati N Hoi Sab Kooo Kahai , Maaiaa Mai Udaasu Raakhai Soee Gur Chaaheeai ?553?
translation: Everyone says that no salvation can be achieved without a Guru, but one requires such a capable True Guru who can guide a person to salvation through His advice while living a householder's life, in a society and enjoying all material comforts.  (553)
